description: Shohei Ohtani doubles (22) on a fly ball to left fielder Lourdes Gurriel Jr.

Teoscar Hernández doubles (17) on a sharp line drive to right fielder Corbin Carroll.   Shohei Ohtani scores.    Teoscar Hernández to 3rd.  Teoscar Hernández advances to 3rd, on a fielding error by right fielder Corbin Carroll.

Gabriel Moreno singles on a sharp ground ball to right fielder Jason Heyward.   Lourdes Gurriel Jr.  to 2nd.
Shohei Ohtani singles on a fly ball to center fielder Alek Thomas.
Eugenio Suárez singles on a line drive to left fielder Teoscar Hernández.
Teoscar Hernández singles on a ground ball to left fielder Lourdes Gurriel Jr.
